author: donaldp
msg: Deprecated interface as it is not widely useful and simpler interface can be accessed by going directly to concrete classes.

author: donaldp
msg: it would be nice if the build system allowed the user to override
the location of tools.jar in .ant.properties, like Cocoon 2's build.xml
does. Currently, build.xml makes the assumption that $JRE_HOME ==
$JAVA_HOME/jre. This is not true on my Debian system (IBM JDK1.3 debs).
The patch attached allows this, and is documented in ant.properties.sample.

author: donaldp
msg: I've attached a small patch to PatternFormatter so that right justified
fields are cropped on the left so that [%-20.20{context}] goes from:
